Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with one token, there is no Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" is not included in Topic in GetEventPropertiesResponse message

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response with one token, there is no Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" is not included in Topic in GetEventPropertiesResponse message Notification contain Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" and Value="true"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response with one token, there is no Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"-2
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" is not included in Topic in GetEventPropertiesResponse message Notification contains Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" and Value="false"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with one token, there is Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" is included in Topic in GetEventPropertiesResponse message Notification contains Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" and Value="false"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with one token, there is Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" is included in Topic in GetEventPropertiesResponse message Notification does not contain Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response with one token, there is Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" is included in Topic in GetEventPropertiesResponse message Notification contains Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" and Value="true"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on PM
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token DUT sends fault on timeout in PullMessage

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Negative test: DUT sends fault on PullMessage (DUT shall accept timeout=1 min)

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: No wsnt:Message in notification message
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Notification message contains no wsnt:Message - NotificationMessage does not correspond to schema

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect topic in Notifocation message
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token DUT sends not expected topic in Notifocation message

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: More than one NotificationMessage
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token DUT sends 2 NotificationMessages on PullMessage request

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: Renew during waiting of PM response
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 30s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends PullMessages response in 55s. Check that TT seds Renew during waiting of PM response

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: no event during Operation delay
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 120s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 30 s DUT sends no event during 30 s Check that TT does not send Renew after the first PM response message, check that DUT delete Subscription and failed test

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: event was sent during Operation delay at second attempt
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 120s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends the first PullMessagesResponse in 55 s without event Check that DUT sends Renew Check that TT sends the second PullMessageRequest

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
STEP 1 - Get Access Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServicePACS12/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Access Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get AccessPointInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that the list of AccessPointInfos is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Get Event service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Event Properties Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that topic list is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validate topics XML representation STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that the event topic is supported STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Check that message contains message description STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Check that the event is correct STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Check that Topic is correct STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Create Pull Point Subsciption Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Check that TerminationTime is specified STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Validate times STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Check if the DUT returned SubscriptionReference STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Check if SubscriptionReference contains address STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Check that URL specified is valid STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Waiting for PullMessagesResponse message (User action required to trigger event) STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Get PullMessages response Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Renew subscription Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 22 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Waiting for PullMessagesResponse message (User action required to trigger event) STEP PASSED
STEP 23 - Get PullMessages response Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 24 - Check that DUT sent notification messages STEP PASSED
STEP 25 - Delete Subscription Manager Timeout has already expired STEP PASSED
STEP 26 - Validate messages STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: PM response at first attempt with real delay
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Set Operation Delay to 60 s Set Termination time to 60 s DUT sends PullMessages with event in 30 s

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on Renew
Test.Description: Set Subscription timeout to 120s (in TT GUI) Set Operation delay to 120 s DUT sends the first PullMessagesResponse in 55 s without event DUT sends fault on Renew

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
STEP 1 - Get Access Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServicePACS12/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Access Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get AccessPointInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that the list of AccessPointInfos is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Get Event service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Event Properties Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that topic list is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validate topics XML representation STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that the event topic is supported STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Check that message contains message description STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Check that the event is correct STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Check that Topic is correct STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Create Pull Point Subsciption Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Check that TerminationTime is specified STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Validate times STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Check if the DUT returned SubscriptionReference STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Check if SubscriptionReference contains address STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Check that URL specified is valid STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Waiting for PullMessagesResponse message (User action required to trigger event) STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Get PullMessages response Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Renew subscription Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Events10.PullpointSubscriptionService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceEvents10\PullpointSubscriptionService.asmx.cs:line 65 at DUT.CameraWebService.Events10.PullpointSubscriptionService.Renew(Renew Renew1) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceEvents10\PullpointSubscriptionService.asmx.cs:line 192 STEP FAILED
STEP 22 - Check that DUT sent notification messages No notification messages received STEP FAILED
STEP 23 - Delete Subscription Manager Timeout has already expired STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED
